content: Continuing a discussion from the Testing BoF in Cologne that came up with @Frank Oemig: we seem to need a canonical representation for v2 messages.
This would be the v2 equivalent for the widely used Canonical XML - see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canonical_XML

it shouldn't be too hard:

  • use the default delimiters
  • no unneeded delimiters (including trailing delimiters)
  • use UTF-8
  • nothing escaped unless it needs to be
